assessment.name: (stem word)
assessment.weight: Demonstrated evidence of advanced achievement of course learning outcomes.

assessment.name: Critical analysis and problem solving
assessment.weight: Critical evaluation of data, cases, problems and their solutions, and implications

assessment.name: Quality of argument
assessment.weight: Perceptive insights in identifying, generating and synthesising competing arguments or perspectives

assessment.name: Application of knowledge and skills
assessment.weight: Extensive application of knowledge and skills

assessment.name: Communication
assessment.weight: Uses the conventions of the discipline to communicate at a professional level
